definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">entity_attacked</field><next><block type="controls_if"><mutation else="1"></mutation><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_binary_ops" inline="false"><field name="OP">AND</field><value name="A"><block type="variables_get_logic"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="true" has_entity="true"></mutation><field name="VAR">global:battleMode</field><value name="entity"><block type="source_entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="logic_binary_ops" inline="false"><field name="OP">OR</field><value name="A"><block type="damagesource_isequalto"><field name="damagetype">PLAYER_ATTACK</field><value name="damagesource"><block type="damagesource_from_deps"></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="damagesource_isequalto"><field name="damagetype">MOB_ATTACK</field><value name="damagesource"><block type="damagesource_from_deps"></block></value></block></value></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="java_code"><field name="CODE">entity.invulnerableTime = 0;</field><next><block type="call_procedure"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" inputs="1"></mutation><field name="procedure">WhenEntitySwingsHand</field><field name="name0">entity</field><value name="arg0"><block type="source_entity_from_deps"></block></value><next><block type="cancel_event"></block></next></block></next></block></statement><statement name="ELSE"><block type="variables_set_logic"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="true" has_entity="true"></mutation><field name="VAR">global:battleMode</field><value name="VAL"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">TRUE</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
